title: Deliciously simple paella
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '2 small onions, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 red pepper, cut into 1cm chunks', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1 pinch of saffron', '350g long grain rice', '200g chicken strips, cooked', '400g frozen prawns', '1/2 chorizo sausage, chopped', '600ml boiling water', '1 vegetable stock cube', '3 tablespoons tomato puree', 'salt and black pepper', 'fresh parsley to garnish']
